snippet: The growth of chemical plants comes amid concerns about future shortages of water and electric power statewide, as well as worries about the impact on air pollution in the Houston area.
lead_paragraph: The growth of chemical plants comes amid concerns about future shortages of water and electric power statewide, as well as worries about the impact on air pollution in the Houston area.

headline.seo: Texas Oil Boom Promises 20,000 New Jobs but Also Water and Electricity Shortages
headline.main: Boom Promises 20,000 New Jobs but Shortages Too
headline.print_headline: Boom Promises 20,000 New Jobs but Shortages Too
